verses.roman:
sevāra adhyakṣa--śrī-paṇḍita haridāsa
tāṅra yaśaḥ-guṇa sarva-jagate prakāśa

synonyms: sevāra—of the service; adhyakṣa—commander; śrī-paṇḍita haridāsa—Haridāsa Paṇḍita; tāṅra—of his; yaśaḥ—fame; guṇa—quality; sarva-jagate—all over the world; prakāśa—known.
translation: In that temple the chief servitor was Śrī Haridāsa Paṇḍita. His qualities and fame are known all over the world.

purport.content: Śrī Haridāsa Paṇḍita was a disciple of Śrī Ananta Ācārya, who was a disciple of Gadādhara Paṇḍita.
